name: ListZoomUpcomingEvents
description:
Retrieve upcoming Zoom meetings and webinars.

Use this tool to list upcoming Zoom meetings and webinar events within a specified one-month period. Requires a Pro or higher plan and appropriate OAuth scopes.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range with 'end_date' should be within one month.

value_schema.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date for the report in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format, within one month of the start date.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of records to return in a single API call, used for paginating results.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token for paginating through large result sets, expires in 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: event_type_to_query
parameters.description: Specify the type of Zoom event to query: 'meeting', 'webinar', or 'all'. Defaults to 'all'.

value_schema.description:
The type of event to query. 
* `meeting` — A meeting event. 
* `webinar` — A webinar event. 
* `all` — Both meeting and webinar events.

This value defaults to `all`.

parameters.name: group_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the group for filtering events to include only those where the host is a member. Obtainable via the Zoom 'List groups' API.

value_schema.description:
The group ID. To get a group ID, use the [**List groups**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/groups) API. 

 **Note:** The API response will only contain meetings where the host is a member of the queried group ID.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

value_schema.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The type of event to query. 
* `meeting` — A meeting event. 
* `webinar` — A webinar event. 
* `all` — Both meeting and webinar events.

This value defaults to `all`.

value_schema.description:
The type of event to query. 
* `meeting` — A meeting event. 
* `webinar` — A webinar event. 
* `all` — Both meeting and webinar events.

This value defaults to `all`.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description:
The group ID. To get a group ID, use the [**List groups**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/groups) API. 

 **Note:** The API response will only contain meetings where the host is a member of the queried group ID.

value_schema.description:
The group ID. To get a group ID, use the [**List groups**](/api-reference/zoom-api/methods#operation/groups) API. 

 **Note:** The API response will only contain meetings where the host is a member of the queried group ID.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
